tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SustainabilityData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10, 2),
  energy_consumption DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE BusinessOperations (
	op_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	business_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	employees INT NOT NULL,
	sustainability_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalData (
	data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	operation_id INT REFERENCES BusinessOperations(op_id),
	carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10,2),
	energy_usage DECIMAL(10,2),
	waste_generated DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10, 2),
    energy_consumption DECIMAL(10, 2),
    waste_generation DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    company_id INT,
    environmental_standard_id INT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpact (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    business_id INT,
    data_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    impact_type VARCHAR(50),
    value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_data (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_name VARCHAR(255),
   sustainability_score INT,
   carbon_footprint DECIMAL,
   water_usage DECIMAL,
   sustainability_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE emissions_data (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_name VARCHAR(255),
   greenhouse_gas_emissions DECIMAL,
   pollutant_emissions DECIMAL,
   emissions_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_name VARCHAR(255),
   electricity_consumption DECIMAL,
   natural_gas_consumption DECIMAL,
   energy_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE waste_management (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_name VARCHAR(255),
   waste_generated DECIMAL,
   recycling_rate DECIMAL,
   waste_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_reports (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_name VARCHAR(255),
   report_type VARCHAR(50),
   report_date DATE,
   report_details TEXT
);
